long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With our extension will help you connect to Bing Chat service on chrome browser by changing some header request data.

*Note -------------
Make sure you login to MS account and enable the chat service.
If you got any issue when connect to Bing Chat, please try:
- Clear your cache and cookie.
- Reconnect again MS account.

If still got issue, you can connect us by the contact information.
